short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a different new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can donate with ease while doing everyday tasks on the web. Every time you open a new tab you get an ad. We collect the revenue from these ads to give out to charities. We donate 90 percent of our revenue from every ad to charities.
